law.catch_line: Residuary and other legatees not entitled to contribution.
law.text: A residuary legatee, or legatee after or subject to the payment of debts, or a devisee to whom an estate has or shall be devised to pay debts, shall not, after paying such debts, be entitled to contribution.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2075.
